answers.answer: Good luck hope everything comes out good, i just hady baby at 34 Weeks do to preeclampsia, so he has to b in the NICU for a lil while. So just take it easy n stay relaxed.so baby can stay in belly as long as possible
We are back home after a night in hospital not liking all the meds they had me on but for now our little girl is staying in there. Praying for you and your little one
Is ur lil girl still in the oven. Hope all its well.
At 35 weeks the baby would be okay to be delivered.. Buttttt... It would be in the nicu for a minute.. Please try and relax and keep off your feet.. I hope baby comes later..

question: In hospital for second time this week they are trying to stop my labor again and this time it doesn't seem to be working I am 35 weeks and they want me to at least be 36 weeks.
title: Nervous
